column5: I justed called Fort Frances, no one can cross over if charged with DUI in the last 5 years. After 5 years you can apply for the permit, but is costly. After 10 years you are free to cross

>I justed called Fort Frances, no one can cross over if >charged with DUI in the last 5 years. After 5 years you can >apply for the permit, but is costly. After 10 years you are >free to cross Don't you have to be CONVICTED not just charged?
yes, convicted of DUI sorry for not being clear
I wouldn't be surprised if you had a pending DUI case that you wouldn't be allowed access either. It isn't the States.
